summary: Safari is a web browser made by Apple that comes with their computers, iPhones, and iPads. It was first released in 2003 and has been updated many times. Safari uses a special tool called WebKit to work. It was the fastest browser for Mac computers when it first came out. Apple stopped making a version for Windows computers because not many people used it. Over the years, Safari added features like a reading mode, extensions, and better privacy tools. The latest version, Safari 15, has a new look.
title: Safari (web browser)
